title: How to Watch Competitive LoL

embed.description: Wanting to learn what happening in League of Legends but have no idea what you're watching? Perhaps you have a friend or family member that you want to watch eSports with but aren't sure how to tell them what's going on? That's where this video comes in handy!

body:
If you have someone, such as family members or a significant other, who has no idea what's going on when they see you watching League of Legends, show them this video!

Video was inspired by my girlfriend having no idea what was on the screen when I hijacked the big screen in the lounge room to watch the IWCQ.

replies.body:
Also 1 more thing I would like to add to this:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ugXC7g3p0JU
